title: Ambisonic Parks and Forests FOA /Stereo
description: Immersive Parks and Forests features 28 HD  Sound Effects with a large selection of Parks, Forests and Residential Areas.
longDescription: From 24/96 Sound Effects. Immersive Parks and Forests features 28 HD Sound Effects with a large selection of Parks, Forests and Residential Areas. Most of the tracks were captured in Los Angeles during the 2020 Corona Virus shutdown, so the ambiences are quieter with less human activity. Recorded with a Voyage Audio 2nd Order Spatial Microphone.  Mastered with ProTools Ultimate in 2 configurations: Ambisonic (Ambix 1st Order (Wyzx) and Stereo (L-R) Most tracks are 2-3 Minutes in length with embedded metadata. All new, original recordings.  Demo Track here: soundcloud. Need O2A 9 channel 2nd Order Ambisonic? We offer free upgrades for the tracks, just contact us at www.2496sfx.com
technicalDetails:
• • Features: 28 Stereo and 28 FOA Ambix (Wyzx) Ambisonic (4channel) 44.1 kHz, 16bit Sound Effects

Number of Audio Waves: 56

Number of Audio Cues: 56

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo, FOA Ambisonic (4channel) WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: YES

Minutes of audio provided: 63 Min

Supported Development Platforms: Audio files are compatible with any platform

Supported Target Build Platforms: Audio files are compatible with any target build platforms
